title: Legal to sell my account?
body:
So I am totally over this game since this season started. All I get in my games are feeders and trolls. Yes, yes I know what you are going to say that I have to carry myself etc etc... But when I tp in to a fight at 3 mins into the game as Irelia, my team picks up 3 kills thanks to the tp and we snowball the game from there. At 10 minutes we are 20 kills ahead but no towers haveb een taken. I keep asking them to help me push but no, scuttle more important. In the end we lost the game with a 15 kill lead and about 100 cs for each player(excluding support) lead all becoase no one would help me push. This is just one of my many games that go pretty much the same way. So I am getting very frustrated and mad at this game. I would like to sell my account before i actually get cancer from playing with idiots again. Any legal way?

TL;DR I want to sell my account... How can i do so legally?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: As mentioned, this is against the Terms of Use. There isn't a way to sell your account legally.
not that i ever will because i love this game could you give it away to somebody??? just giving them your login info and be like here bruh have this.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XZxV5uLO,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-03-30T22:18:41.667+0000)
>
> No dice, unfortunately.

What about just giving your account away?  Like never playing on it again, not trading for anything (including money).  Just a straight up hey here you go.

> [{quoted}](name=ThatH1N1,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XZxV5uLO,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-30T22:47:42.157+0000)
>
> What about just giving your account away?  Like never playing on it again, not trading for anything (including money).  Just a straight up hey here you go.

Riot can't monetize it so they don't allow it. Think about how much money they could potentially make off of a fresh account vs one already made with skins and who knows what else on it.
Really? Ok then thanks. Guess that's one account lying dormant for the next couple years. Thanks for the quick response
If you're going to quit you might aswell sell it. Get your money.
Well It's good you asked and accept the response.
Account selling is highly prohibited. No exceptions, don't bother.
yea I'm starting to hate this game as well
